mapper.select: select * from info_facility order by fac_bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into info_facility (fac_bno, fac_name, fac_lat, fac_lng, fac_admin, fac_numperson, fac_usingperson, fac_aptname) values (seq_apart.nextval, #{fac_name},#{fac_lat},#{fac_lng}, #{fac_admin}, #{fac_numperson}, #{fac_usingperson}, #{fac_aptname})
